mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(name, disabled, remark, user_id, tenant_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{disabled}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{tenantId}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update tbl_product set name = #{name}, disabled = #{disabled}, remark = #{remark}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from tbl_product
where id = #{key} or name like concat('%', #{key},'%')
order by id desc
